title: Windows Sensitivity resets upon entering LoL game
body: When ever I enter a game of LoL (after champion select when we all load in) my windows sensitivity resets itself from 6/11 to 9/11. So far I've been manually changing it back each game, but it's really annoying and I would like a fix. I've done some research and several people have experienced the same problem with no fix.

replies.body: Well these forums are incredibly helpful, so I've proceeded to submitting a support ticket. Thanks for your attempted help Wuks. The most genuine of thanks goes out to the Rito staff. Thanks so much for your time and support through this agonizing time of which I contemplate killing myself.
This is still a problem, any help is appreciated.
Can you go into your League of Legends/config/game.cfg file, and copy/paste the contents here?
Tried it but sensitivity is still changing.
